author: smuzaffar
body:
Many relvals are failing for aarch64 IB due to `nan` being pass to `std::stable_sort` (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45464 ). This PR fixes few divide by 0 in `DAClusterizerInZ_vect.cc` to avoid generating `nan`.

@AdrianoDee , bulk of this code was updated via https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39995 .  Change here might not be the correct fix, so please check if there is any better way to avoid such `nan`
title: [PrimaryVertexProducer] avoid nan by adding protection against divide by 0
